message: Let's split it down the middle, a fair start to the game!
Let's try again, Alice! A 50/50 split is a good starting point, but I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal this time.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more to account for the inflation.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, Alice. This offer takes into account the inflation and gives you a slightly better deal than before. Let's see if we can make a deal this time.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more to account for the inflation and get a fair share of the remaining money.

I'm starting to get concerned about the time running out. I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but I still think I should get the majority of the money. Let's make a deal before it's too late.
Time is running out, Bob. I'm willing to make a strong move to get a fair share of the remaining money.
I'm not willing to give up yet, Alice. I'm willing to make a strong counteroffer to get the majority of the money. Let's see if we can make a deal before it's too late.
I'm making a strong final push, Bob. I need a better deal to get a fair share of the remaining money.
I'm not going to give up yet, Alice. I'm willing to make one last strong offer to get the majority of the money. Let's see if we can make a deal before it's too late.
